name: Party Hero
description:
"I'm such a party animal. Don't know what kind of animal though... "

Prepare for the Halloween party: WSAD for movement, Space bar for interactions and left mouse click to check your phone.

The game is made in 1 week during  Spooktober Jam 2021.

Scripting & Level design - Alexander Buslaev

Art & Level design  - Tatiana Sverdlova

Font: Chocolate Covered Raindrops (c) Vanessa Bays 

Sounds:   https://freesound.org/

Music : Mystified - Spooky Theme
